mapper.insert: insert ignore into trade (trade_id, exchange_type, symbol, symbol_type, order_type, price, amount, `time`, created) value (#{tradeId}, #{exchangeType}, #{symbol}, #{symbolType}, #{orderType}, #{price}, #{amount}, #{time}, #{created})
mapper.select: select stddev_samp(price) from trade where symbol = #{symbol} and created > date_sub(now(), INTERVAL #{minute} MINUTE);
select stddev_samp(pt.price) from (select price from trade where symbol = #{symbol} order by id desc limit #{points}) pt;
